desc: Locks the current editor group to prevent it from being reused for opening other files.
Unlocks the currently selected editor group, allowing for the movement and resizing of the editor within the window.
Folds (collapses) the innermost uncollapsed region at the cursor location in the editor.
Folds the code block at the current cursor position and all the inner blocks recursively.
Collapses all foldable regions in the editor.
Unfolds all regions in the editor, expanding all hidden text.
Folds all block comment regions in the editor.
Folds all regions in the editor that have been marked with folding markers.
Unfolds all regions in the editor that have been folded by markers.
Creates a folding range from the current selection in the editor.
Removes all manually created folding ranges in the editor.
Triggers the rename action for the selected symbol in the editor, allowing the user to rename the symbol and automatically update all references to it within the scope.
Opens the global search interface with the replace option enabled to perform text replacement across multiple files.
Toggles to synchronize the scrolling of multiple editor panes, allowing all open editors to scroll together while keeping the current cursor position visible in each pane..
Opens the Find and Replace panel in the active editor.
Splits the currently active editor into two, either side by side or stacked vertically.
Splits the active editor group into two groups orthogonally.
Splits the active editor group and moves the editor into the new group on the left side.
Splits the currently active editor into two, placing the new editor group to the right of the current one.
Splits the currently active editor into two, placing the new editor group above the current one.
Splits the currently active editor into two, placing the new editor group below the current one.
Trims trailing whitespace from the current file.
